roleset.name: require
roleset.note: NECESSITATE-V NOTES: This is an ugly verb. (from necessitate.01-v)

example.name: active
example.text: In a statement, Mr. Merksamer described the filing as a ``legal technicality,'' but also said that ``our inability to obtain trade credit, combined with a need to ensure that our stores were properly stocked for the Christmas season, necessitated our filing Chapter 11.''
example.arg: our inability to obtain trade credit
combined with a need to ensure that our stores were properly stocked for the Christmas season

example.name: passive
example.text: Bank Building earlier said [the restatement]-1 is necessitated *trace*-1 by ``certain errors in recording receivables and payables'' at its Loughman Cabinet division.
example.arg: by ``certain errors in recording receivables and payables'' at its Loughman Cabinet division

roleset.name: essential
roleset.note: NECESSARY-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-1. (from necessary.01-j)

role.descr: necessary for/to what; dependent on arg1

example.name: both args
example.text: I am an Independent voter and my opinion is that who ever the Republican nominee is , they probably wo n't be willing to do what-1 [*-1] 's necessary for the U.S. economy if elected .
